content: Ah, the classic "code under pressure" scenario. I hope you had an umbrella—or at least good error handling! What’s your go-to programming language?
Good morning. How are you doing?
Good morning, Glory! I'm doing well, just waiting for that perfect bug to fix. What's your favorite development tool?
Well, so I do use Java, JavaScript, so whatsoever. You know, I like it.
Great choice! Java and JavaScript are powerful. Can you describe a complex problem you've solved using one of them?
Well, I remember actually also we had like networking class, so we had like to program a chat server software and with concurrency and we solved it with Java, so Java threads, so it was very great.
Ah, the joys of threading! Like jugglers at a circus—one misstep and it's chaos. How do you handle debugging multithreaded applications?
